ISSUE.TITLE: Table List is not refreshing and removing deleted table list when table is deleted
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: please provide the following details : NocoDB used as docker : false NocoDB version : 0.9.3 Database used in NC_DB URL : defaults to sqlite3 Project was created by clicking : New Project Database on which spreadsheet is created : sqlite3 OS on which NocoDB is running : linux Node.js version if running as node : 12 Database version : used by nocodb **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Go to Table and create table, open it in tab. Create another table, open it in tab 2. Move to previous table tab and delete it 3. In table list, table still remains **Expected behavior** Should be removed when deleted
